parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per Trial Summary parameter value

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study within the submission.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain most relevant to the observation.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.TSSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number used to ensure uniqueness within a TSPARMCD. Allows inclusion of multiple records for the same TSPARMCD, and can be used to join related records.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: TSSEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.TSGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a group of related records. This is not the sponsor-defined protocol group number.
datasetVariables.label: Group Identifier
datasetVariables.name: TSGRPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90009

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.TSPARMCD

datasetVariables.description: Short character value for the trial design characteristic described in TSPARM. Value must be 8 characters or less.
datasetVariables.label: Trial Summary Parameter Short Name
datasetVariables.name: TSPARMCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90007

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.TSPARM

datasetVariables.description: Term for the trial parameter. Value must be 40 characters or less.
datasetVariables.label: Trial Summary Parameter
datasetVariables.name: TSPARM

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.TSVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of the TS parameter (e.g., "FDA" when TSPARM is GLP Type). The values for some parameters may be subject to controlled terminology. See the Controlled Terms, Codelist, or Format column in Section 7.6.3 that lists all defined parameters. TSVAL can only be null if TSVALNF is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Value
datasetVariables.name: TSVAL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TS.TSVALNF

datasetVariables.description: Null flavor for the value of the TSPARMs, which should be included according to the trial summary code table below if and only if TSVAL is null.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Null Flavor
datasetVariables.name: TSVALNF

description: A trial design domain that contains one record for each trial summary characteristic. This domain is not subject oriented. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C53483, 2018-06-29)
label: Trial Summary
name: TS
